title: Bug 19089: No popup menu on Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089: No popup menu on Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When using Photon, there is no popup menu displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
EB: I expect a popup menu to be displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, allowing me to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Result: A popup menu should be displayed, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.

Actual Result: No popup menu is displayed.
